channel.title: Contribute on Love and Tolerance Online
channel.description: Recent content in Contribute on Love and Tolerance Online

item.title: What is the money used for?
item.author: loveandtolerancezoom@gmail.com (Love and Tolerance Online)
item.description: The love and tolerance group follows the 7th tradition and uses any donations in the following manner: Expenses Zoom fees Website hosting fees Literature We provide Big Books to anyone that requests them Associated shipping fees Service org donations We donate to both the General Service office and our local intergroup. https://www.aa.org/self-support-where-money-and-spirituality-mix

item.title: Venmo
item.author: loveandtolerancezoom@gmail.com (Love and Tolerance Online)
item.description: @loveandtolerance - Jess T https://venmo.com/u/loveandtolerance Instructions for using Venmo: https://help.venmo.com/hc/en-us/articles/210413477-Sending-Requesting-Money

item.title: Cash.app

item.description: $loveandtol - JessT https://cash.app/$loveandtol Instructions to use cash app: https://cash.app/send

item.title: Zelle

item.title: Check
item.author: loveandtolerancezoom@gmail.com (Love and Tolerance Online)
item.description: treasurer@loveandtol.com If you would like to pay by check, please email our treasurer and they will send you the mailing address.
